title: solidhyips04
author: solidhyips04
content: Hey Admin, This is Laura Macias, Marketing manager of www.solidhyips.com. We would like to present you our marketing offer in which we are providing email,google and facebook marketing service which also includes guaranteed investments. ( Our exclusive listing has potential to bring 10000$+ investments ) . If you would like to know more about us,you can reply to this email.We can also show you our latest work results.Thanks, Team Solidhyips Website : https://www.solidhyips.com Email : support@solidhyips.com

comments.author: Saisher
comments.body: This is the gambling section you should move your offer to the service section where it belongs, why of all the names for marketing you choose solidhyip with the word HYIP on it, many investors know that the word HYIP stands for High Yield Investor Project, people will think that this is an investment site or you are promoting HYIPs and Ponzi scheme projects.

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: Saisher on December 11, 2022, 12:48:43 PMthe word HYIP stands for High Yield Investor ProjectYou are right. I was going to create a scam accusation against OP but before doing that I wanted to read the comment. And from this comment, I came to know it is not a High Yield Investor Project. Then I visited the link of the site and it made me more clear.

comments.author: cabron
comments.body: Quote from: Saisher on December 11, 2022, 12:48:43 PMThis is the gambling section you should move your offer to the service section where it belongs, why of all the names for marketing you choose solidhyip with the word HYIP on it, many investors know that the word HYIP stands for High Yield Investor Project, people will think that this is an investment site or you are promoting HYIPs and Ponzi scheme projects.I was thinking that he is looking for clients who will potentially avail of the services they provide. Apparently, he meant to promote such projects that promise those high-yield scams. By the looks of thier website, it's surrounded by ads. The blog instead ruin the reputation since they compiled a list of HYIP projects. That made them easy to spot. Good job.

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: Quote from: shasan on December 11, 2022, 02:53:48 PMQuote from: Saisher on December 11, 2022, 12:48:43 PMthe word HYIP stands for High Yield Investor ProjectYou are right. I was going to create a scam accusation against OP but before doing that I wanted to read the comment. And from this comment, I came to know it is not a High Yield Investor Project. Then I visited the link of the site and it made me more clear. Probably the site was a former hyip promoter, but it's blog review site for crypto, nfts,  and including casino, i saw a stake review there too. Regardless the review if legit or just a paid one, i won't make business with or promote my casino site to such domain name with low traffic.

comments.author: Baofeng
comments.body: Quote from: PX-Z on December 11, 2022, 04:40:14 PMQuote from: shasan on December 11, 2022, 02:53:48 PMQuote from: Saisher on December 11, 2022, 12:48:43 PMthe word HYIP stands for High Yield Investor ProjectYou are right. I was going to create a scam accusation against OP but before doing that I wanted to read the comment. And from this comment, I came to know it is not a High Yield Investor Project. Then I visited the link of the site and it made me more clear. Probably the site was a former hyip promoter, but it's blog review site for crypto, nfts,  and including casino, i saw a stake review there too. Regardless the review if legit or just a paid one, i won't make business with or promote my casino site to such domain name with low traffic.Probably, but I have checked the website and it seems very fresh, registered this year 2022. And that is why reason why there is no to low traffic with this site.So I will still be very cautious here, I'm sorry to tell the OP but the site doesn't look professional as well. Guaranteed investment? there's no such thing as guarantee when you market, you are giving false hope to your clients.

comments.author: agustina2
comments.body: I don't mind the name of the site as that wasn't a big deal. My issue with them is I don't believe that their site has good traffic to promote a certain website but as they say, it's not on that site but maybe they will market it on their own various methods. But I don't know how can they prove that their marketing service is genuine.Their site also has tons of improper placement of ads. Not a good site to browse with those banners and ads everywhere on the page.If someone will market their site, why not stick with proven and effective methods instead of doing business with an unknown marketer?

comments.author: coinerer
comments.body: Proposals on marketing services are always appreciated.  Because marketing acts as the oxygen for the survival of a project.  Be it a gambling site or any other site and marketing project brings investors.  The better the marketing strategy of the project, the more investment the project is able to get.  So since you've got a marketing offer, it's better to move it to the services thread rather than the gambling section.  Please do this and you will be able to get better response

comments.author: harizen
comments.body: Since your brand name is quite new here, you should tell more about the community, anything about your company's profile, and more details about your offered marketing service. You don't need to publicize everything but much better if important details are already posted. You can't attract potential clients with that kind of announcement and introduction. You should give them reasons why should they contact you.But honestly and to tell you frankly, such offers coming from a brand new account are not really being entertained or supported here not unless you found a way to answer all questions and prove to all that your offered service is worth spending on. Since marketing requires a decent budget, companies will prefer to choose a popular and famous marketing service that will be worth their money, and your company seems not to be on that tier or level yet.

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.created_time: December 11, 2022, 10:29:13 PMLast edit: December 11, 2022, 10:59:31 PM by coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: PX-Z on December 11, 2022, 04:40:14 PMQuote from: shasan on December 11, 2022, 02:53:48 PMQuote from: Saisher on December 11, 2022, 12:48:43 PMthe word HYIP stands for High Yield Investor ProjectYou are right. I was going to create a scam accusation against OP but before doing that I wanted to read the comment. And from this comment, I came to know it is not a High Yield Investor Project. Then I visited the link of the site and it made me more clear. Probably the site was a former hyip promoter, but it's blog review site for crypto, nfts,  and including casino, i saw a stake review there too. Regardless the review if legit or just a paid one, i won't make business with or promote my casino site to such domain name with low traffic.Make no mistake about it they are still promoting HYIP they have another similar thread but this time they are offering to market HYIPs Getting no investments on your hyip project ? Try our marketing service the name on their domain is very much related to HYIPs that just included casino advertising because they think that HYIP investors are also into gambling, OP deserves a tag for promoting HYIPs something we hate to see being promoted here.

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: Quote from: Baofeng on December 11, 2022, 09:36:50 PMProbably, but I have checked the website and it seems very fresh, registered this year 2022. And that is why reason why there is no to low traffic with this site.Weird, i didn't check the website whois but the wayback machine archive tell different. The site is already was up way back 2016 and got active just this 2022, yet whois tells that the domain created is just this year.Code:https://web.archive.org/web/20161009172820/http://solidhyips.com/
